title: SINLESS DEVIL'S FOOD CAKE
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F and grease an 11x15 inch nonstick cake pan or bunt pan.
Mix brown sugar, flour, sweetener, baking powder, baking chocolate and sea salt in a large bowl.
Grab a smaller bowl and combine the margarine, applesauce, buttermilk, egg substitute, vanilla extract and black coffee.
Make a well, or indention, into the dry ingredient mix and pour wet ingredients into indention. Use an electric mixer on medium speed and mix until batter is smooth.
Bake cake for 20 minutes. Let the cake cool for about 5 minutes, and decorate with your favorite sugar-free frosting!
ingredients: ¼	Unsweetened Apple Sauce [substitute, for oil]
